title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9951 - Access To Or Correction/amendment Of Records Of The Elderly Pharmaceutical Insurance Coverage Panel Subject To The Personal Privacy Protection Law
content:

§ 9951.1 - Statement of purpose

§ 9951.4 - Persons from whom records may be obtained
§ 9951.5 - Fees for copying records
§ 9951.6 - Procedures governing inspection and copying of records
§ 9951.7 - Appeals of denial of access to records
§ 9951.8 - Procedures governing the correction or amendment of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. KK, pt. 9951

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §§ 87[b], 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
